A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan I wanted to love this movie..... but unfortunately I can't even just tolerate it.  Poor story\, poor pacing\, bad script\, and just not fun.   The worst part is it created continuity problems with past installments that will be hard to explain away.  I was so angry when I left the theater\, $200 million spent on this movie and THIS is what they came up with ?
